alert.note: Alert for Lower Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 4:36PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Terrebonne Parish through 515 PM CDT... At 436 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cocodrie, or 26 miles southwest of Galliano, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dulac, Cocodrie, Tambour Bay Buoy and Lumcon Center Buoy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
